title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization-Collection15 (Science, Tech.4)
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 15 (Science, Technology 4):

We have 20 titles here:

-  Abd el-Qader (Trans.) - The Prophetic Medicine by Ibn al-Qayyem al-Jawziyah (2003)

-  Bakar - Classification of Knowledge in Islam; a Study in Islamic Philosophies of Science (1998)

-  Bonadeo - Abd al-Latif al-Bagdadi's Philosophical Journey; from Aristotle's Metaphysics to the Metaphysical Science (2013)

-  Bradley - The Birth of Mathematics; Ancient Times to 1300 (2006)

-  Chabas & Goldstein - Essays on Medieval Computational Astronomy (2015)

-  Charette - Mathematical Instrumentation in 14th-Century Egypt and Syria; The Illustrated Treatise of Najm al-Din al-Misri (2003)

-  Giladi - Muslim Midwives; the Craft of Birthing in the Premodern Middle East  (2015)

-  Huff - The Rise of Early Modern Science; Islam, China, and the West, 2nd ed. (2003)

-  Iqbal - The Making of Islamic Science (2009)

-  King - Architecture and Astronomy; the Ventilators of Medieval Cairo and Their Secrets, J. of the American Oriental Society, 104.1 (1984)

-  King - Islamic Mathematical Astronomy (1986)

-  Nasr - Science and Civilization in Islam (2001)

-  Nasrallah - Annals of the Caliph's Kitchens; Ibn Sayyar al-Warraq's Tenth-Century Baghdadi Cookbook (2007)

-  Rashed - Geometry and Dioptrics in Classical Islam (2005)

-  Rashed & Shank - Classical Mathematics from Al-Khwarizmi to Descartes (2015)

-  Rashed (Ed.) - Encyclopedia of the History of Arabic Science, Vol. 1, Astronomy - Theoretical and Applied (1996)

-  Rashed (Ed.) - Thabit ibn Qurra; Science and Philosophy in Ninth-Century Baghdad (2009)

-  Ruggles - Islamic Gardens and Landscapes (2008)

-  Saad & Said - Greco-Arab and Islamic Herbal Medicine (2011)

-  Zaidi - Islam, Modernity, and the Human Sciences (2011)
